title: Ord. pertaining to St. Louis Area Agency on Aging

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 103    INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN STEPHEN CONWAY    An Ordinance pertaining to the Division of St. Louis Area Agency on Aging; repealing Section One, Two, Three, Four, Five, Six and Seven of Ordinance 56015, which has as its subject matter the establishment of the Division and sets forth the powers and duties of such Division and provides for the establishment of an Advisory Council of Aging and its duties and powers and enacting, in lieu thereof, a new ordinance pertaining to the same subject matter, and containing a severability and emergency clause.
